content.query:
-- DROP TABLE dbo.dw_userdata
Create PROC proc_copy_into_dw_userdata as 

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dw' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE dbo.dw_userdata
	(
	[registration_dttm] datetime2(7),
	[id] int,
	[first_name] varchar(8000),
	[last_name] varchar(8000),
	[email] varchar(8000),
	[gender] varchar(8000),
	[ip_address] varchar(8000),
	[cc] varchar(8000),
	[country] varchar(8000),
	[birthdate] varchar(8000),
	[salary] float,
	[title] varchar(8000),
	[comments] varchar(8000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO


COPY INTO dbo.dw_userdata
(registration_dttm 1, id 2, first_name 3, last_name 4, email 5, gender 6, ip_address 7, cc 8, country 9, birthdate 10, salary 11, title 12, comments 13)
FROM 'https://asablobacct.dfs.core.windows.net/staging/userdata1.parquet'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,COMPRESSION = 'snappy'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.dw_userdata
GO
